title: T.I. Says Iggy Azalea Started 'Acting Different' After Finding Out White People Liked Her
text:
T.I. took the time to carefully explain why he said that Iggy Azalea was a huge "blunder."

The rapper appeared on "The Breakfast Club" to promote his podcast called "ExpediTIously" and addressed his controversial comments about his former protege.

"I feel like when she found out white people liked her and she didn't really need black people to like her anymore, she switched up," T.I. said.

"started acting different, made moves that I wasn't proud of," He continued, "that kind of put my reputation in the line of fire."

Related:

Porn Co. Defends Iggy Azalea in Nude Photo Leak Scandal: It's a 'Violation of Iggy's Rights'

Iggy Azalea Deletes Her Social Media After Nude Photo Leak

Iggy Azalea & French Montana's Brother Sued Over Car Accident

There's Nothing Cheesy About Iggy Azalea's Sexy ? Pic

Claims She Was Arrogant

T.I. said that Iggy was arrogant about going against his grain and said it was her "energy" that caused people to turn their backs on the Australian Rapper.

His "blunder" comment came earlier this month when he told The Root, “I’m still actively looking for another female rapper who can undo the blunder of Iggy Azalea.”

Iggy Did Not Appreciate Being Called A Blunder
